text: Peter van de Klashorst (11 February 195711 September 2024) was a Dutch painter, sculptor, and photographer. He was born in Santpoort, Netherlands. His career was based in Amsterdam. In 1982, he won the Buning Brongers Award. Klashorst died of lymphoma in Amsterdam on 11 September 2024, at the age of 67. At the time of his death, he also had HIV. ==Work by Peter Klashorst== File:Heaven above (by Peter Klashorst).jpg|Heaven above File:Find the differences (painting by Peter Klashorst).jpg|Find the differences ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1957 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Dutch painters Category:Dutch sculptors Category:Dutch photographers Category:Writers from Amsterdam Category:Artists from Amsterdam Category:Deaths from lymphoma
title: Peter Klashorst
